condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

description.narrative:
1:Percentage of payroll stations able to process monthly salary within 15 days of close of solar month 2: [Dopped in 2018] Police Pay Budget expenditure rate (%) matching LOTFA funding spend rate 3: Number of police officers paid disaggregated by gender
2017 Indicator 1. Percentage of ANP payroll stations with fixed MOIA intranet connectivity 2. Percentage of GDPDC payroll stations with fixed MOIA intranet connectivity 3. Number of payroll stations with delayed salaries due to connectivity issues 4. Percentage rating of the DRR Plan implemented
2016 Indicators 1. Percentage of ANP payroll stations with MOIA intranet connectivity. 2. Percentage of General Directorate of Prisons and Correction Centers (GDPDC) payroll stations with fixed MOIA intranet connectivity. 3. Number of monthly MOIA-NOC help desk calls due to inability to connect to the MOIA intranet 4. Percentage of DRR Plan under implementation

comment.narrative: 1. 100% 2.Total ANP and GDPDC paid within Tashkeel (November 2019): 119,065 Total ANP: 111,985 (109,351 male; 2,634 female)
